Question
========

If you simultaneously flip four coins, what probability rule can we then apply to calculate the probability of the outcome that for all the coins lies cross above?

Answerlist
----------

* General addition rule
* Complement rule
* Addition rule
* Product rule

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* General addition rule: Incorrect
* Complement rule: Incorrect
* Addition rule: Incorrect
* Product rule: Correct
